name: 郭宏源
objective: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
schedule:
1. Review of Logic Design Fundamentals
2. Combinational Logic
3. Designing with NAND and NOR Gates
4. Mealy/Moore Sequential Circuit Design
5. Sequential Circuit Timing
6. Hardware Description Languages
7. VHDL Modules
8. Modeling Flip-Flops
9. Midterm Examination
10. Simple Synthesis Examples
11. Variables, Signals, and Constants
12. Brief Overview of Programmable Logic Devices
13. Field-Programmable Gate Arrays (FPG As)
14. BCD to 7-Segmcnt Display Decoder
15. Traffic Light Controller
16. Synchronization and Debouncing
17. SM Charts and Microprogramming
18. Final Examination
scorePolicy:
平時: 40%
期中考: 30%
期末考: 30%
materials:
1. Digital Systems Design Using VHDL 2/e, Charles Roth, 2008/2, ISBN：9780495244707, Cengage
2. Fundamentals of Digital Logic with VHDL Design 3/e , Stephen Brown, 2009/3, ISBN：9780071287654, Mc Graw Hill
